name: Slide Stars
storyline:
Play with the world's biggest Stars! 
Are you ready for the world’s most extreme water slide adventure? Play with 20 of the biggest social media stars in an adventure of a lifetime! Choose your favorite star and help them become the first to make it to the finish line! 
 
Blast through crazy waterslides! 
Slide your way through some of the craziest water slides, packed with platforming challenges and extraordinary enemies. Overcome insane challenges like rolling boulders, banana bomb throwing monkeys and a gigantic kraken! Nothing goes too far!
summary: It’s 2020, and Instagram, TikTok, and other social media platforms are where young people spend their day. Lion Castle brought all the leading influencers and role models of many countries together, reimagined them into Fortnite style visuals and put it all together in an already-proven game concept.
